lines.text:
[narrating]
I know now the only thing worse than telling someone your sex secrets is not telling them at all.
I've been thinking how can Jack Ryan help my campaign grow.

[voiceover]
After lunch we continued our conversation. We left the Caffè and went straight to my office.
[Christine is shown going down on him already in the elevator]
[Jack's wife calls him while his mistress goes down on him in his office]

Karen, hi, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm in a meeting right now. Yeah, yeah, I'm sorry, I'm gonna be late again tonight. I'm sorry. Right. I love you too, sweetheart. I love you too, I'll see you later, bye bye.

[makes him climax]
I don't love you, Jack. I just wanna fuck you.
